segments.advisor_message: So lets talk a bit about your health, uh how would you say you are doing right now?
segments.client_message: Uhm, well, I'm okay, I guess. Like, I have a few issues, uh sometimes I get really tired, but overall, I manage. Not really serious, I don’t think.

segments.advisor_message: Got it. You mentioned a few issues, but no big health problems? Also, do you smoke or have you ever smoked?
segments.client_message: Oh, yeah, I smoke, um. Like, about a pack a day for, like, uh, a long time now, maybe since, like, I was 18.

segments.advisor_message: Thanks for sharing that. Also, do you have any plans for long-term care, or is there someone who handles your, uh, power of attorney?
segments.client_message: I don’t think I need long-term care right now, um, but yeah, my sister has power of attorny, just in case. I should get that will sorted soon too. Can we, uh, set a time to discuss my will next time?
